description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.archetypes.Item.sTWRGNQuZREcAe4H]{Doshko Specialist}

The third tooth strives to prove the doshko a superior weapon. You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls when performing @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#disarm]{disarm}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#sunder]{sunder}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.R33uiOMesYP0ISWl#trip]{trip} combat maneuvers with a doshko. If your attack roll is a natural 20, you also apply the doshko’s critical hit effect (if any) to the target.

modifiers.name: Tooth That Bites Steel (Ex)
modifiers.notes: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls when performing disarm, sunder, or trip combat maneuvers with a doshko. If your attack roll is a natural 20, you also apply the doshko’s critical hit effect (if any) to the target.
